original: intros H. unfold continuity_2d_pt in *. unfold continuity_2d_pt in H. intros eps. specialize H with eps. unfold locally_2d in *. unfold locally_2d in H. intros H0. apply H in H0. clear H. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. specialize H0 with eps. unfold locally_2d in H0. intros H. apply H0 in H. clear H0. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. specialize H with eps. unfold locally_2d in H. intros H0. apply H in H0. clear H. unfold locally_2d. exists eps. intros u v. apply Rabs_minus_sym.
